title: ServeWatch Tool!
snippet: Welcome Server Security Monitoring tool. Explore more of my work Â» AboutServeWatch is a monitoring tool for servers.It is simple to use, and notifies you as soon as it detects either foreign connections,creation of a new file, or a change in an existing file via email.It also logs the actions locally. ServeWatch implements an install and forgetmodel, meaning it will run completely in the background without requiring any work from you!Features Easy to install New / edited file detection Recursive file scanning Immediate email notifications Secure login system Automated background scanning No hassle &amp; easy to use!Techstack HTML/CSS/JS Flask/PythonTODO Database design Create the database Create tables Add columns to user table Add authentication Add core functionalityUser TypesAdmin User add/edit/delete usersViewer User view logsDashboard Failed and Successful login attempts Offline logs Foreign Connections Set configurations eg email
